welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tyler, the Rose Capital of America! We're thrilled to have you here to experience our city's charming beauty and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tyler has to offer.

restaurants.name: Little Italy
restaurants.description: Little Italy is a italian restaurant located in Tyler.

restaurants.name: la Madeleine French Bakery & Café Tyler
restaurants.description: la Madeleine French Bakery & Café Tyler is a french restaurant located in Tyler.

restaurants.name: New York Pizza & Pasta
restaurants.description: New York Pizza & Pasta is a italian restaurant located in Tyler.

restaurants.name: GoFish Modern Japanese Kitchen
restaurants.description: GoFish Modern Japanese Kitchen is a japanese restaurant located in Tyler.

restaurants.name: Torchy's Tacos
restaurants.description: Torchy's Tacos is a taco restaurant located in Tyler.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cherokee County Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cherokee County Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.
